DarkestMod:skillTorch.NAME: Torch
DarkestMod:skillTorch.DESCRIPTION: And apply !B! block, and gain !M! darkestmod:Light

DarkestMod:attackPoisonTest.NAME: POISON
DarkestMod:attackPoisonTest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! darkestmod:Blight to the enemy. Gain NL darkestmod:Stress

DarkestMod:Finale.NAME: Finale
DarkestMod:Finale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And Exhaust your hand

DarkestMod:Hound's Harry.NAME: Hound's Harry
DarkestMod:Hound's Harry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! Bleed to all enemies

DarkestMod:Punish.NAME: Punish
DarkestMod:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. And apply !M! darkestmod:Bleed to the enemy

DarkestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
DarkestMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
DarkestMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

DarkestMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
DarkestMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

DarkestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
DarkestMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !darkestmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

DarkestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
DarkestMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !darkestmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
